content: * around join with slip_stitch in chain-2 space of beg shell turn 18 shells rnds 6-12 repeat round 5 edging rounds note work rnds 13-15 loosely or on a one-size-larger hook to prevent tightness around edge round 13 chain 1 3 single_crochet across top of each shell i e single_crochet in chain-2 space & 2 double_crochet in each shell ending last repeat with single_crochet in chain-2 space of last shell single_crochet in first double_crochet of last shell skip last double_crochet join with slip_stitch to first single_crochet 53 single_crochet fasten_off mc join cc turn round 14 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet around join with slip_stitch turn 53 single_crochet round 15 picot round chain 1 slip_stitch in first 2 single_crochet for picot chain 3 slip_stitch in 3rd chain from hook *slip_stitch in next 2 single_crochet picot repeat from * around join with slip_stitch and fasten_off 27 picots bootie make 2 row 1 with size g hook and mc chain 28 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook and each chain across turn 26 double_crochet row 2 chain 2 1 double_crochet in same st at base of turning chain-2 chain 2 single_crochet in same st *skip 2 double_crochet in next double_crochet work 2 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet shell completed repeat from * across ignore turning chain at end of row turn 9 shells 2 row 3 chain 2 1 double_crochet in chain-2 space of first shell chain 2 single_crochet in same space shell completed *in next chain-2 space work 2 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet repeat from * across turn 9 shells row 4 chain 1 slip_stitch across ea space and ea double_crochet of first two shells i e 6 sts slip_stitch in chain-2 space of third shell chain 2 double_crochet in same space chain 2 single_crochet in same space beg shell completed *in next chain-2 space work 2 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet shell completed repeat from * 3 more times leave rest of row unworked turn 5 shells row 5 chain 2 1 double_crochet in chain-2 space of first shell chain 2 single_crochet in same space beg shell completed *in next chain-2 space work 2 double_crochet chain 2 single_crochet shell completed repeat from * across turn 5 shells edging note work row 6-8 loosely or on a one-size-larger hook to avoid tightness at top of cuff row 6 chain 1 3 single_crochet across top of ea shell i e single_crochet in chain-2 space and 2 double_crochet of ea shell 15 single_crochet fasten_off mc join cc turn row 7 chain 1 single_crochet in ea single_crochet across turn 15 single_crochet row 8 chain 1 slip_stitch in first 2 single_crochet for picot chain 3 slip_stitch in 3rd chain from hook *slip_stitch in next 2 single_crochet picot repeat from * across ending with slip_stitch in last single_crochet 7 picots fasten_off with right sides decrease fold bootie in half and whipstitch seam down front of cuff foot and sole turn bootie right-side out ties make 2 with smaller hook and contrast color chain 85 fasten_off weave ties through
